StorageManagerPersist.summary: The persist() method of the interface requests permission to use persistent storage, and returns a {{jsxref('Promise')}} that resolves to true if permission is granted and bucket mode is persistent, and false otherwise. The browser may or may not honor the request, depending on browser-specific rules. (For more details, see the guide to Storage quotas and eviction criteria.)

blockquote.para: This method is not available in Web Workers, though the interface is.
